```{r load_in_data and results, include=FALSE}
# this was created with data_prep_ml.Rmd

```



```{r hyper_parameter_tuning}



# eyeball the metrics 
all.metrics<-tune_res %>%
  collect_metrics() 

all.metrics %>%
  filter(.metric == "brier_class") %>%
  select(mean, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "brier_class")




all.metrics %>%
  filter(.metric == "mn_log_loss") %>%
  select(mean, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "mn_log_loss")


```

```{r}

extracts<-tune_res %>%
  collect_notes()

# A ROC curve. I'm not sure if this is quite right, but I think it is.
predictions<-tune_res %>%
  collect_predictions()


predictions %>%
  group_by(id, mtry) %>%
  dplyr::filter(mtry==3) %>%
  roc_curve(market_desc, .pred_Jumbo:.pred_Small) %>%
  autoplot()
  
predictions %>%
  group_by(id, mtry) %>%
  dplyr::filter(mtry==3) %>%
  pr_curve(market_desc, .pred_Jumbo:.pred_Small) %>%
  autoplot()


  
```
